===Overview===
The '''British Army''' is the principal land warfare force of the [[United Kingdom]]. The modern British Army traces back to 1707 AD, with an antecedent in the [[English Army]] that was created at the Restoration in 1660 AD. The term "British Army" was adopted in 1707 AD after the Acts of Union between [[England]] and [[Scotland]].

===Events===
====17th Century====
In 1649, [[Oliver Cromwell (Earth-616)|Oliver Cromwell]] led the English Army into [[Ireland]] forcing them under British rule. This lasted all the way until the 20th Century.{{r|Amazing High Adventure #1}}	

====18th Century====
A war between the Britain and France caused great conflict in the world and the territories. It was at this time the [[American Revolutionary War]] began and they lost the 13 colonies that formed their own independent nation, the [[United States of America]].{{r|Captain America Vol 1 194}}{{r|Fantastic Four Vol 4 10}}  

====18th Century====
The Empire went to war with France beginning the [[Napoleonic Wars]] in 1803.{{r|Mystic Vol 1 44}} Britain defeated [[Napoléon Bonaparte (Earth-616)|Napoléon Bonaparte]] and his armies at [[Waterloo]] in 1815, and took many of their colonies in the process.{{r|Amazing High Adventure Vol 1 4}}

It was during this time which became known [[War of 1812]] was a conflict between the USA and the British Empire. It was during this the [[White House]] was burnt down.{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 1 506}}{{r|Marvel Tales Vol 1 156}}

In 1860, the British and the French allied together to fight the [[China|Chinese]] during the the Second Opium War. They faced the [[Bei Bang-Wen (Earth-616)|Iron Fist]] at the Forts of Taku. Although a great warrior, the army lost and were taken prisoner and forced into hard labor, and then the power ofthe [[Iron Fist]] left him.{{r|Immortal Iron Fist Vol 1 #3}}

====20th Century====
The British Army entered both [[World War I]] and [[World War II]] on the side of the Allies. From the end of [[World War II]] the British fought the [[Soviet Union]] in the [[Cold War (Event)|Cold War]]. The one major war in the Cold War included the [[Korean War]].
